title: Happy Birthday, Kanata-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Zzz~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kanata-san! I have won the right to accom-.... pany you today, but you look so comfortable in your sleep....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Mmmn~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, what an innocent smile. I can’t wake you up like this.... There’s still some time left, so I guess I’ll wait for a bit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fwaaah~, that was a good nap~. Huh, it’s Dia-chan. What are you doing here? Heeey, Dia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>....Hwah!? A-, aaah.... What am I doing....!? Kanata-san! Happy birthday!! We have a party prepared for you, so let’s go there right away. Aaargh, what a mess, even though I got the role of picking you up....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>D-, Dia-chan, calm down~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’ll make it up to you for this blunder! I shall be your escort for the entire party today, Kanata-san. I’ll make it the best time ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I’m so happy~. Thank you, Dia-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
